accessibility.text: Atomically clear new data bit and increment index
Let non-realtime thread know that new data is available
However, introduced race because we now unatomically load store the idx variable
Only swap indices if new data is available
Add a new bit \"BIT_NEWDATA\" to the index variable
void processAudio (const float* buffer, size_t n)
